{'path': ''}.response: The 'GetFilesList' API function within the Aspose.Cells Cloud tool allows users to retrieve a list of all files available in a specified directory. Given that the path provided as the API input is an empty string, it is probable that the user is requesting a list of all files from the root directory. The function will access the cloud storage linked to the Aspose.Cells Cloud account and enumerate all the files, potentially including directories, located at the root. The output will be a structured list containing information such as file names, sizes, types, and modification dates. The response should be in JSON format, which might resemble the following: { 'files':[ {'name':'FinancialReport.xlsx', 'size':24068, 'type':'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet', 'modifiedDate':'2023-03-17T15:46:22Z'}, {'name':'ProjectPlanner.xls', 'size':15360, 'type':'application/vnd.ms-excel', 'modifiedDate':'2023-03-15T13:30:45Z'}, {'name':'SalesData.csv', 'size':1042, 'type':'text/csv', 'modifiedDate':'2023-03-18T12:22:56Z'} ]} Keep in mind that the exact structure of the JSON output should comply with the specific design of the Aspose.Cells Cloud response format for file listings.

{'path': '/', 'storagename': 'storage'}.response: The 'GetFilesList' API function is designed to retrieve details of files stored in a specified directory in the Aspose.Cells Cloud. Upon receiving the input with a specified 'path' value as '/' and 'storagename' as 'storage', the API will target the root directory of the designated storage space named 'storage'. It will then gather a list of files and directories contained within that space. The results will provide details including names, sizes, types, and modification dates for each file present in the root directory of 'storage'. The response is structured in JSON and may look similar to the example below: { 'files': [ {'name': 'QuarterlyReport.xlsx', 'size': 30210, 'type': 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet', 'modifiedDate': '2023-04-01T10:00:00Z'}, {'name': 'Budget_2023.xls', 'size': 15870, 'type': 'application/vnd.ms-excel', 'modifiedDate': '2023-03-29T11:20:35Z'}, {'name': 'InventoryList.xlsx', 'size': 19850, 'type': 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet', 'modifiedDate': '2023-03-30T09:15:24Z'}, {'name': 'EmployeeData.csv', 'size': 5120, 'type': 'text/csv', 'modifiedDate': '2023-04-02T14:30:50Z'} ]} This list represents a snapshot of the files in the specified 'storage' at the time of the API call, and it can be used to manage or manipulate files using other functions provided by the Aspose.Cells Cloud API.
